    • Method Detail

      • internalProcess

        protected boolean internalProcess()
                           throws XmlPatcherWorkerException
        Iterates over all conditions entities and checks their return value (a boolean). If the trigger is of type ALL the trigger will return as value true only when all conditions are met, otherwise it will return true if any of the conditions is met.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        XmlPatcherWorkerException

      • runTimeCheck

                        throws XmlPatcherWorkerException
        Description copied from class: XmlPatcherWorker
        performs runtime check over the data to detect possible problems

        Returns:
        true if the check is successful
